item.title: Religion
item.description: Recently I got the privilege to write an article for a non-governmental organisation named @lovenation_hme of Indian Institute of Law, Indore. The organisation aims to create unity among religions as being the responsible and literate citizens of India. The organisation also states that “India is ours and we are proud citizens of India”. Article Religion is supposed to be the means of attaining peace but in practicality, in reality, today every religion has got a base of fundamentalism and involvement of terrorism.
